p:
The participant flow diagram is shown in Figure 1. The clinicopathological characteristics and surgical outcomes of patients were shown in Tables 1 and 2, and there were no significant differences between 2 groups ( P>0.05). Additionally, the anesthesiologists of all patients came from the same anesthesia team, and the use of anesthetic drugs during the operation should be as consistent as possible. See
Appendix 4 for details.
